channel.title: Posts on Billy's Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Billy's Thoughts

item.title: The Minimum Viable Blog
item.description: I’ve always been fascinated by how great writers can break apart complex systems, stir up emotions, and build worlds. Writing is an especially important skill now, as we live and breathe email, iMessage, and Slack. Where you can find friends, and even a tribe, solely via Twitter. As with anything I find interesting, I wanted to try doing it myself. With writing, though, I wasn’t sure where or how to start.

item.title: Coming soon
item.description: I’m currently working on a first post! In the meantime, here’s a bit about me and here are some of my favourite links.
